title: Assault
text: Whoever commits assault shall be punished...
punishment: Imprisonment up to 3 months, fine, or both.

title: Voluntarily causing hurt
text: Whoever causes bodily pain, disease or infirmity...
punishment: Imprisonment up to 1 year or fine or both.
examples: He injured me with a stick

title: Criminal intimidation
text: Whoever commits the offence of criminal intimidation...
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years or fine or both.
